title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson enjoy a loved up date night at Universal Studios Halloween experience
text:
They're on track to enjoy their first holiday season together.

And Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson, 22, appeared very much in love during their date night at the Universal Studio Halloween Horror Nights experience on Saturday evening in Los Angeles.

The 26-year-old dressed casually and struggled to wipe the smile off her face as the couple walked around the amusement park.

Scroll down for video

Date night: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson appeared very much in love on Saturday night when they enjoyed a date to the Halloween experience at Universal Studios in Los Angeles

Miley rocked a black tank top that was cropped and drew attention to her trim frame.

She teamed the look with straight legged jeans of the same color and a pair of heeled boots.

The Mother's Daughter singer accessorised with a newsboy cap and a yellow Moschino drawstring backpack to carry her belongings.

In all black: Miley rocked a black tank top that was cropped and drew attention to her trim frame

Trim and toned: She teamed the look with straight legged jeans of the same color and a pair of heeled boots

Happy days: Miley struggled to wipe the smile off of her face during the outing

She came prepared: The Mother's Daughter singer accessorised with a newsboy cap and a yellow Moschino drawstring backpack to carry her belongings

Miley styled her blonde tresses out for the event and appeared to be wearing a minimal amount of makeup.

Cody was also dressed casually in a House Of Harley-Davidson, Milwaukee T-shirt and a pair of jeans.

He also added a cap and boots to his look to match his lady-love.

Comfortable: Cody was also dressed casually in a House Of Harley-Davidson, Milwaukee T-shirt and a pair of jeans

Natural beauty: Miley styled her blonde tresses out for the event and appeared to be wearing a minimal amount of makeup

Dressing alike: Cody also added a cap and boots to his look to match his lady-love

Going strong: They're on track to enjoy their first holiday season together

Cody and Miley were spotted walking around the park with their hands around each other, looking very much a couple - after the Australian was overheard complaining about his new love while Down Under earlier in the week.

Perhaps advised by pal Ariana Grande who was spotted at the experience on Thursday night, Miley, Cody and their friends opted for the VIP fast lane passes to avoid the queues.

The pair's outing comes after Cody was heard on the phone to a friend while in Sydney complaining about the former Disney star 'won't listen to him.'

She's no rookie! Miley didn't appear phased by her heels as she walked around the park with ease

Love is in the air: Cody and Miley were spotted walking around the park with their hands around each other, looking very much a couple - after the Australian was overheard complaining about his new love while Down Under earlier in the week

Tips from Ari? Perhaps advised by pal Ariana Grande who was spotted at the experience on Thursday night, Miley, Cody and their friends opted for the VIP fast lane passes to avoid the queues

Close bond: Throughout the night, the pair were seen walking with their arms around each other

Trouble in paradise? The pair's outing comes after Cody was heard on the phone to a friend while in Sydney complaining about the former Disney star 'won't listen to him.'

'We had a weird one yesterday... not really an argument but she kind of shut down,' Cody said, according to a DailyMail.com source.

'Yeah, it was kind of s**tty, but whatever.'

The singer also talked about how he had been getting criticized by fans in Australia for dating fellow-countryman Liam Hemsworth's estranged wife.

'I'm copping s**t here because of [her] exes. You know, her husband is Australian.'

The two singers, who have been close friends for many years, started dating in September, right after her summer fling with Kaitlynn Carter ended and less than two months after she announced her split from husband Liam.

Miley shut down? 'We had a weird one yesterday... not really an argument but she kind of shut down,' Cody said, according to a DailyMail.com source

Worked through their issues? Despite the drama earlier in the week, the couple appeared closer than ever on Saturday
description: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson appeared very much in love on Saturday night when they enjoyed a date to the Halloween experience at Universal Studios in Los Angeles.
